section_title: REPORTING AND REVIEW OF INFORMATION FROM ANNEX I PARTIES UNDER THE PROTOCOL:
sentences: This issue ( FCCC/SBI/2009/INF.2 ) was first taken up by the SBI plenary on 3 June.
It was then addressed in informal consultations, chaired by Anke Herold (Germany).
Discussions focused on training for members of expert review teams, including the participation of developing country experts and the need for capacity building.
The SBI closing plenary adopted the conclusions on 10 June.
